channel.title: AGNI Research Network
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Welcome to the group
item.description: We extend our greetings to the newly joined people. - Hello everyone! Active Galactic Nuclei (AGN) and its related fields are subjects of dynamic research in our country. The research activities are spread all over the country in various institutions, universities and colleges. We look forward to building a community of Indian Astronomical Researchers working on AGN, with the aim...

item.title: Flake it till you make it
item.description: Excerpt from Soulshaping by Jeff Brown - Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who...
